    Fields in menu declared as MenuType

    private MenuType Menu.type
    Type of the menu item (MainCourse, Dessert, Drink).
    Methods in menu that return MenuType
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private MenuType MenuUI.chooseMenuType()
    Prompts user to select the type of menu item when creating one.

    Gets type of the menu item.
    static MenuType MenuType.valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
    static MenuType[] MenuType.values()
    Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
